about_the_game:
Remember to wishlist the Full Game!

Experience the Prologue!

Play through the events prior to the story of the main game and witness the beginning of the journey Glyde and Wing set out on! Explore a number of elemental biomes full of collectibles, dragons, puzzles, secrets and more!

Fiery and Action-packed Combat System!

Experience a deep, challenging and fun combat system! Easy to learn, but hard to master! Use 8 unique elemental forms and more than 60 powerful elemental abilities unlocked throughout the game! Study the elements in Glyde's arsenal and create your own unique combos in any order you want by mixing and matching various moves on-the-fly!

Save other dragons, explore the environment and collect everything!

As the corruption spreads, on your journey you will encounter other dragons who will need your help! Heal the dragons and you will be rewarded! The world is full of secrets, hidden places, puzzles and crystals to collect!

Beautiful Original Soundtrack!

Lose yourself in the epic and melodic soundtrack composed especially for the prologue!

Bright, colourful and high quality stylized graphics!

The prologue features beautiful stylized graphics with vibrant environments! Many graphical options and settings available in the game menu will allow you to enjoy Glyde in the best graphics and performance settings available for your machine!

Interesting and fully voiced cast of characters!

Every dragon you speak with is fully and uniquely voiced by a different voice actor to make the world feel even more alive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9300H 2.4GHz (Quad core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X 6-Core Processor 3.8GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A standalone action adventure game where you play as a dragon! Use 8 elemental forms with more than 60 different abilities to defeat your foes! Explore the environment, collect crystals, complete puzzles and save other dragons!
